info.title: 100% Responsive
info.text: No matter which the device youâ€™re on, our site is fully responsive and stories look beautiful on any screen.

info.title: No Photo Upload Limit
info.text: Our tool has no limits on uploads or bandwidth. Freely upload in bulk and share all of your stories in one go.

info.title: Available to Embed
info.text: Embed Tweets, Facebook posts, Instagram media, Vimeo or YouTube videos, Google Maps, and more.

info.title: Custom Domain
info.text: With Photosnap subscriptions you can host your stories on your own domain. You can also remove our branding!

info.title: Boost Your Experience
info.text: Users that viewed your story or gallery can easily get notifed of new and featured stories with our built in mailing list.

info.title: Drag & Drop Image
info.text: Easily drag and drop your image and get beautiful shots everytime. No over the top tooling to add friction to creating stories.
